value.title: Query folding to improve Power BI performance
value.excerpt: Happy New Year!!! I am finally back from my vacation and we have a technical video for you.  Other important links: https://www.mssqltips.com/sqlservertip/3635/query-folding-in-power-query-to-improve-performance/ Chris Webb: https://blog.crossjoin.co.uk/2017/06/11/query-folding-and-writing-your-own-sql-queries-in-power-querypower-biexcel-get-transform/

value.title: Real time dashboards in Power BI with Stream Analytics

value.title: Schedule data downloads / exports in Power BI
value.excerpt: You can export data or download data out of Power BI in many different ways and depending on the source, you can schedule refresh those data dumps too.   In this video, I will give you one example on how to do that.  Other resources mentioned in this video: Export data with DAX Studio: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Gfgnk6R0Qw

value.title: The good and bad of key influencers visual - Power BI feb 2019 update

Make sure you check out Microsoft documentation for more

value.title: Trim column headers with spaces in between words in one step in Power Query
value.excerpt: There is a trim function in Power Query to get rid of spaces at the beginning or end of a phrase, but unlike excel trim, it wont get rid of excess whitespaces between words.  In this video, I will show you how to get rid of all spaces no matter where they are on one step in power query.  Other column

value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
value.excerpt: I take a look at how Power BI and Azure Active Directory interact.  Really it is more about Azure Active Directory and how do you get users into AAD.  This came up as I get pinged a lot from folks wondering how they can use AAD with Power BI, not necessarily realizing that it is already there.  http://blogs.technet.com/b/powerbisupport/archive/2015/09/15/azure-active-directory-and-power-bi.aspx
